content: Starting at a negative adjusted EBITDA of $24 million for fiscal year '22, we assumed the following for fiscal year '23; first a $5 million improvement to our LCM or lower of cost or market charges; second $7 million in incremental gross profits due to DT and traditional sorghum revenue growth; third, a $5 million improvement in international forage gross profits due to both the higher end of our expected growth as well as overall improvements in our production costs.
